body: Vijay - this should fix the infinite loop you were seeing.
I will merge this, but it's showing a Travis fail right now. Let me look into that.

Two fails in a row that look like this. I will do another Travis restart, but it looks completely unrelated.

Working on something to remove this flakiness.

New flakiness!
I0227 17:14:05.544941586   12031 writes_done_hangs_with_pending_read_legacy.c:56] test_writes_done_hangs_with_pending_read/chttp2/fake_secure_fullstack

E0227 17:14:10.545097805   12031 cq_verifier.c:205] assertion failed: e->data.finished.status == ev->data.finished.status
FAILED: bins/dbg/chttp2_fake_security_writes_done_hangs_with_pending_read_legacy_test [ret=-6]

Ok.

Passes.
Significantly deflakes the C core.
Merge away?
